paragraphs.title: Define Item Domain Class
Convert Row to Item

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
itemsRDD: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[Item] = MapPartitionsRDD[1375] at map at <console>:78

paragraphs.title: Define Approximate LSH Jaccard Similarity Algo
paragraphs.text:
def getApproxLSHJaccardSimilarity(minHasher: MinHasher32, item1: Item, item2: Item): Double = {
  val minHashSignatureItem1 = item1.tags.map(tag => minHasher.init(tag))
    .reduce((leftMinHashSignature, rightMinHashSignature) => minHasher.plus(leftMinHashSignature, rightMinHashSignature))

  val minHashSignatureItem2 = item2.tags.map(tag => minHasher.init(tag))
    .reduce((leftMinHashSignature, rightMinHashSignature) => minHasher.plus(leftMinHashSignature, rightMinHashSignature))

  minHasher.similarity(minHashSignatureItem1, minHashSignatureItem2).toDouble
}

result.msg: getApproxLSHJaccardSimilarity: (minHasher: com.twitter.algebird.MinHasher32, item1: Item, item2: Item)Double

paragraphs.title: Convert The ClusterAssignmentsRDD Into A DataFrame
paragraphs.text:
val schema = StructType(StructField("itemId", LongType, true) :: StructField("clusterId", IntegerType, true) :: Nil)

val clusterAssignmentsRowRDD = clusterAssignmentsRDD.map(clusterAssignmentRDD => 
  Row(clusterAssignmentRDD._1, clusterAssignmentRDD._2))

val clusterAssignmentsDF = sqlContext.createDataFrame(clusterAssignmentsRowRDD, schema)

paragraphs.title: Cluster Details
paragraphs.text:
// Enrich the cluster assignment tuples with itemsDF
val joinedItemsClustersDF = clusterAssignmentsDF.select($"clusterId", $"itemId")
  .join(itemsDF.select($"id", $"title", $"tags"), $"itemId" === $"id").select($"itemId", $"clusterId", $"title", $"tags").sort($"clusterId", $"itemId")
  
z.show(joinedItemsClustersDF)
